CustomField.formula: if (ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Faible'), IMAGE("/resource/1623751189000/Icon_Flag_Green?", "",32, 32), if (ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Moyen'), IMAGE("/resource/1623751255000/Icon_Flag_Yellow?", "",32, 32), if (ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Élevée'), IMAGE("/resource/1623751238000/Icon_Flag_Red?", "",32, 32), IMAGE("/resource/1623751165000/Icon_Flag_Black", "",32, 32) )))
CustomField.label: Priorité
